add-contact-to-list.description: Add a contact or multiple contacts to an existing contact list.

props.name: list_id
props.description: Select the contact list to add contacts to.

props.name: contacts
props.description: JSON array of contacts to add to the list. Each contact must have phone_number and can include name and template_variables.

create-campaign.description: Create a new outbound calling campaign.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the campaign.

props.name: description
props.description: A description of the campaign (optional).

props.name: agent_id
props.description: Select the AI agent to use for the campaign.

props.name: list_id
props.description: Select the contact list for the campaign.

props.name: sender_phone_numbers
props.description: Select phone numbers to use for making calls.

props.name: delay_between_calls
props.description: Time to wait between calls in seconds.

props.name: scheduled_time
props.description: When to start the campaign (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) ISO 8601.

props.name: timezone
props.description: Timezone for the scheduled time (e.g., America/New_York).

props.name: rotate_numbers_after
props.description: Number of contacts to call before rotating to the next phone number.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the contact list.

props.name: description
props.description: A description of the contact list (optional).

props.name: contacts
props.description: JSON array of contacts. Each contact must have phone_number and can include name, template_variables.

delete-campaign.description: Delete a campaign with optional contact list deletion.

props.name: campaign_id
props.description: The ID of the campaign to delete.

props.name: delete_contact_list
props.description: Also delete the associated contact list (optional).

edit-contact-list.description: Update/replace all contacts in an existing contact list.

props.name: list_id
props.description: Select the contact list to edit.

props.name: contacts
props.description: JSON array of contacts to replace the entire list

props.name: contacts
props.description: JSON array of contacts to replace the entire list. Each contact must have phone_number and can include name and template_variables.

props.name: contacts
props.description: Current contacts from list. Edit this JSON to update the entire list.

props.name: contacts
props.description: Could not load contacts. Please enter manually.

get-call-details.description: Retrieve details of a specific call by call SID.

props.name: call_sid
props.description: The unique identifier of the call.

get-contacts-from-list.description: Retrieve all contacts from a specific contact list.

props.name: list_id
props.description: Select the contact list to retrieve contacts from.

make-call.description: Initiate an outbound call using Kallabot AI agent.

props.name: agent_id
props.description: Select the AI agent to use for the call.

props.name: recipient_phone_number
props.description: The phone number to call in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890).

props.name: sender_phone_number
props.description: The phone number to make the call from.

props.name: template_variables
props.description: Variables to be used in the agent template (optional).

props.name: webhook_url
props.description: URL to receive call status updates (optional).

catch_webhook.description: Receives webhook data when call events occur from Kallabot AI agents.
